name: Podcasts - NATIONAL AGRI-MARKETING ASSOCIATION
description:
Podcasts - NATIONAL AGRI-MARKETING ASSOCIATION

## Podcasts were produced and sponsored by AgReliant Genetics and Growmark.

Making the Most of Virtual InterviewsJoin recruiters from GROWMARK, Inc. and AgReliant to learn more about making the most of your virtual time with a recruiter. In this podcast, Kayla Tobias and Clayton Michael-Butler discuss how to prepare for and successfully execute those 10 minute time slots with recruiters at virtual career fairs and how to market yourself in a virtu
